00015 class Plugins_Twitter_Cron extends Common_Cron
00016 {
00017     protected $_account;
00018     protected $_client;
00019     protected $_conf;
00020 
00021     /**
00022      * @return void
00023      */
00024     function __construct()
00025     {
00026         // Call the Model constructor
00027         parent::__construct();
00028     }
00029 
00030     /**
00031      * Método encargado de establecer conexión con twitter
00032      * @param User_Accounts_Data $account
00033      * @param obj $auth
00034      */
00035     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00036      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Cron#connect($idp)
00037      */
00038     public function connect($account)
00039     {
00040         $this->start = microtime();
00041 
00042         $this->_account = $account;
00043         $this->_idUP = $this->_account->getId();
00044         $this->_credentials = unserialize($account->getAuth());
00045 
00046         $config = array(
00047             'version' => '1.0',
00048             'requestScheme' => Zend_Oauth::REQUEST_SCHEME_HEADER,
00049             'signatureMethod' => 'HMAC-SHA1',
00050             'callbackUrl' => site_url('accounts/auth'),
00051         );
00052 
00053         $this->_ci->config->load('apikeys', TRUE);
00054         $config = array_merge($config, $this->_ci->config->item('twitter', 'apikeys'));
00055         $this->_config = $config;
00056 
00057         $this->_client = new Zend_Service_Twitter();
00058         $this->_client->setLocalHttpClient($this->_credentials->getHttpClient($this->_config));
00059     }
00060 
00061     /**
00062      * Método encargado de recoger los timelines del usuario y sus amigos
00063      * @return void
00064      */
00065     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00066      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Cron#update()
00067      */
00068     public function update()
00069     {
00070         if ($this->_client->isAuthorised()) {
00071 
00072             $messageMapper = Message_Mapper::get_instance();
00073             $lastId = $messageMapper->getLastId($this->_account->getId());
00074 
00075             if (is_numeric($lastId)) {
00076 
00077                 $options = array("since_id" => $lastId);
00078 
00079             } else {
00080 
00081                 $options = array();
00082             }
00083 
00084             $resp = $this->_client->statusFriendsTimeline($options);
00085 
00086             if (!$resp->isError()) {
00087 
00088                 Plugins_Twitter_DB::save($resp, "0", $this->_account->getId());
00089 
00090             } else {
00091 
00092                 //echo "connection error";
00093             }
00094 
00095             $resp = $this->_client->statusUserTimeline(array("include_rts" => 1));
00096 
00097             if (!$resp->isError()) {
00098 
00099                 Plugins_Twitter_DB::save($resp, "1", $this->_account->getId());
00100 
00101             } else {
00102 
00103                 //echo "connection error";
00104             }
00105 
00106         } else {
00107 
00108             //echo "client not authorized";
00109         }
00110 
00111         if ($this->debugMode === true) {
00112             echo "\r\n Twitter cron elapset time : ".$this->elapsedTime()."s\r\n";
00113         }
00114 
00115         $accountMapper = User_Accounts_Mapper::get_instance();
00116         $this->_account->setLastUpdate(time());
00117 
00118         $data = array(
00119             "lastUpdate" => $this->_account->getLastUpdate()
00120         );
00121 
00122         $accountMapper->updateFromArray($this->_account->getId(), $data);
00123     }
00124 }
